text: 28 Years Later is an upcoming American-British post-apocalyptic horror movie. It is expected to be released on 20 June 2025. It was directed by Danny Boyle. He also helped co-produce it with Alex Garland, Andrew Macdonald, Peter Rice, and Bernie Bellew. It is the third movie in the 28 Days Later trilogy, following the 2002 movie 28 Days Later and the 2007 movie 28 Weeks Later. A sequel to 28 Years Later titled 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple was shot back- to-back. In the movie, a group of survivors on a British island try to live their lives while surrounded by people infected with the Rage Virus. A young boy goes out to search for a doctor to try and help his mother who is dying.
